attributes.action: Scrap 2021 exams, in favour of School Based assesments.
attributes.additional_details:
This will ensure the wellbeing of children and also in the interest of fairness and consistency across the entire UK.

Children have already missed out on so much of their education already and continue to have it disrupted by periods of isolation and the lack or their full time teachers.

Don't let them become the forgotten generation.
attributes.background:
It has recently been announced that the Welsh Government is to scrap the 2021 GCSE, AS and A Levels in favour of classroom based assement.

If the UK Government implements this policy, it will create a level playing field across the UK.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/326066
